parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: INote to attach to this magnetic line

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: 0.0 <= Attachment position on magnetic line <= 1.0; valid only if IMagneticLine::EqualSpacing is false

title: IMagneticLine.AddNote
description: Attaches to this magnetic line the specified note at the specified position.
signature:
System.Boolean AddNote( 
   Note
Note
,
   System.Double
Position
)

parameters.name: Note
parameters.description: INote to attach to this magnetic line

parameters.name: Position
parameters.description: 0.0 <= Attachment position on magnetic line <= 1.0; valid only if IMagneticLine::EqualSpacing is false

returns: True if successful, false if not (see Remarks )
remarks: All notes attached to a magnetic line must be from the same view.
